content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 17 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the ratings of Sun Life  Financial Inc. (TSE  NYSE: SLF) including its senior and subordinated notes  as  well as the Insurer Financial Strength (IFS) ratings of SLF's primary Canadian  insurance subsidiary  Sun Life Assurance Co. of Canada (SLAC)  at 'AA-'. A full  list of ratings follows at the end of this release. The Rating Outlook for all  ratings has been revised to Positive fro
name: Sun Life Financial Inc
title: Fitch Revises Sun Life Financial Inc.'s Outlook to Positive; Affirms Ratings
